#summary A brief introduction to Maxtable Query Language (MQL)

MQL is based on the style of traditional relational query language.
  * *CREATE TABLE*.....create table table_name (column1 type1, ...,cloumnx type x) 
  * *INSERT*....................insert into table_name (column1_value,...columnx_value)
  * *DELETE*..................delete table_name (column1_value)
  * *SELECT*..................select table_name (column1_value)
  * *SELECTRANGE*.............selectrange table_name (column1_value1, column1_value2)
  * *DROP*.....................drop table_name

*Examples*
  * create table
{{{
create table metabase (filename varchar, filesize int, serveraddr varchar)
}}}
  * insert data
{{{
insert into metabase (/home/tnsoft/yxue/maxtable/victory.txt, 16000, 192.168.1.152)
}}}
  * select data
{{{
select metabase (/home/tnsoft/yxue/maxtable/victory.txt)
}}}
  * delete data
{{{
delete metabase (/home/tnsoft/yxue/maxtable/victory.txt)
}}}
  * drop table
{{{
drop metabase
}}}
